events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop has a cracked screen and it's unusable.
The reported problem is identified as a product defect due to damage on arrival.
Assigning the case to a support agent specialized in product defects and damages.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the cracked screen. I’m here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged screen and the packaging it arrived in?
I’ve attached several pictures showing the crack on the screen and the box which is slightly crushed.
Thank you for the photos. We can send you a replacement laptop at no extra cost or issue a full refund.
I would prefer a replacement laptop if possible, thank you for offering that solution.
We have arranged for a replacement laptop to be shipped to your address within 3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is in good condition.
Yes, I received the replacement today and it works perfectly, thank you for the excellent support.
We are closing your case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
We have sent a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our customer service.
